message_1: What is the IUPAC name for the organic compound with the molecular formula C6H12O2?
message_2: There can be several isomers with the molecular formula C6H12O2, so it is not possible to provide a specific IUPAC name without more information about the structure of the compound. If you can provide the structure or any additional details, I would be happy to help you determine the IUPAC name.
